ovdesc.p: This table allows to define the External ISO domain codes to define a Transaction code.
It holds the ISO family codes and the corresponding ISO sub family codes that are allowed for the Domain code as set by the ISO External Codes

desc.p: Id will hold the ISO standard Bank transaction Domain codes
Id should be validated against list of valid IX.EXTERNAL.CODES
Multi-lingual Field which holds the standard description of the Bank transaction domain code.
ISO standard Bank Transaction Family code. Associated mulit value set with SUB.FAMILY.CODE field
Should not allow empty or duplicate values.
ISO standard Bank transaction Sub family code. Sub value field on Associated multi value set with FAIMILY.CODE field.
Should not allow empty or duplicate values.
